scenario-closeup.label: 厨房场景近景
scenario-closeup.positive: Modern kitchen countertop close-up, realistic, soft natural lighting, shallow depth of field, subtle color palette, clean composition
scenario-closeup.negative: text, watermark, people, hands, cluttered background, extreme perspective

warm-home.label: 温暖家居氛围
warm-home.positive: Warm home kitchen ambience, golden hour sunlight, gentle highlights, clean countertop, premium lifestyle photography, soft focus background
warm-home.negative: text, watermark, harsh contrast, clutter, messy dishes, people

hero-white-bg.label: 产品英雄白底
hero-white-bg.positive: Product hero shot at 45-degree angle, seamless white background, soft studio lighting, crisp edges, realistic stainless steel texture, NO text, NO watermark, PNG with transparent background, high resolution, photorealistic, commercial catalog style
hero-white-bg.negative: text, watermark, logo, extra accessories, reflections of camera, people, hands, low-res, blur, jpeg artifacts

pack-gray.label: 系列灰度小图
pack-gray.positive: Small product packshot on neutral gray, even lighting, simple soft shadow, centered, ready to convert to grayscale, no text, no watermark
pack-gray.negative: text, logo, people, busy background, tilt angle
